001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.util;
007
008import static org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi.ansi;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ConstraintValidationFinding;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationFinding;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationResult;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.JsonSchemaContentValidator.JsonValidationFinding;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.XmlSchemaContentValidator.XmlValidationFinding;
017
018import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogBuilder;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021import org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi;
022import org.fusesource.jansi.Ansi.Color;
023import org.xml.sax.SAXParseException;
024
025import java.net.URI;
026import java.util.List;
027
028import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
030
031public final class LoggingValidationHandler {
032  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(LoggingValidationHandler.class);
033
034  private static final LoggingValidationHandler NO_LOG_EXCPTION_INSTANCE = new LoggingValidationHandler(false);
035  private static final LoggingValidationHandler LOG_EXCPTION_INSTANCE = new LoggingValidationHandler(true);
036
037  private final boolean logExceptions;
038
039  public static LoggingValidationHandler instance() {
040    return instance(false);
041  }
042
043  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "SING_SINGLETON_GETTER_NOT_SYNCHRONIZED",
044      justification = "both values are class initialized")
045  public static LoggingValidationHandler instance(boolean logExceptions) {
046    return logExceptions ? LOG_EXCPTION_INSTANCE : NO_LOG_EXCPTION_INSTANCE;
047  }
048
049  private LoggingValidationHandler(boolean logExceptions) {
050    this.logExceptions = logExceptions;
051  }
052
053  public boolean isLogExceptions() {
054    return logExceptions;
055  }
056
057  public boolean handleValidationResults(IValidationResult result) {
058    handleValidationFindings(result.getFindings());
059    return result.isPassing();
060  }
061
062  public void handleValidationFindings(@NonNull List<? extends IValidationFinding> findings) {
063    for (IValidationFinding finding : findings) {
064      if (finding instanceof JsonValidationFinding) {
065        handleJsonValidationFinding((JsonValidationFinding) finding);
066      } else if (finding instanceof XmlValidationFinding) {
067        handleXmlValidationFinding((XmlValidationFinding) finding);
068      } else if (finding instanceof ConstraintValidationFinding) {
069        handleConstraintValidationFinding((ConstraintValidationFinding) finding);
070      } else {
071        throw new IllegalStateException();
072      }
073    }
074  }
075
076  private void handleJsonValidationFinding(@NonNull JsonValidationFinding finding) {
077    Ansi ansi = generatePreamble(finding.getSeverity());
078
079    ansi = ansi.a('[')
080        .fgBright(Color.WHITE)
081        .a(finding.getCause().getPointerToViolation())
082        .reset()
083        .a(']');
084
085    URI documentUri = finding.getDocumentUri();
086    ansi = documentUri == null
087        ? ansi.format(" %s", finding.getMessage())
088        : ansi.format(" %s [%s]", finding.getMessage(), documentUri.toString());
089
090    getLogger(finding).log(ansi);
091  }
092
093  private void handleXmlValidationFinding(XmlValidationFinding finding) {
094    Ansi ansi = generatePreamble(finding.getSeverity());
095    SAXParseException ex = finding.getCause();
096
097    URI documentUri = finding.getDocumentUri();
098    ansi = documentUri == null
099        ? ansi.format("%s [{%d,%d}]",
100            finding.getMessage(),
101            ex.getLineNumber(),
102            ex.getColumnNumber())
103        : ansi.format("%s [%s{%d,%d}]",
104            finding.getMessage(),
105            documentUri.toString(),
106            ex.getLineNumber(),
107            ex.getColumnNumber());
108
109    getLogger(finding).log(ansi);
110  }
111
112  private void handleConstraintValidationFinding(@NonNull ConstraintValidationFinding finding) {
113    Ansi ansi = generatePreamble(finding.getSeverity());
114
115    getLogger(finding).log(
116        ansi.format("[%s] %s", finding.getTarget().getMetapath(), finding.getMessage()));
117  }
118
119  @NonNull
120  private LogBuilder getLogger(@NonNull IValidationFinding finding) {
121    LogBuilder retval;
122    switch (finding.getSeverity()) {
123    case CRITICAL:
124      retval = LOGGER.atFatal();
125      break;
126    case ERROR:
127      retval = LOGGER.atError();
128      break;
129    case WARNING:
130      retval = LOGGER.atWarn();
131      break;
132    case INFORMATIONAL:
133      retval = LOGGER.atInfo();
134      break;
135    default:
136      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown level: " + finding.getSeverity().name());
137    }
138
139    assert retval != null;
140
141    if (finding.getCause() != null && isLogExceptions()) {
142      retval.withThrowable(finding.getCause());
143    }
144
145    return retval;
146  }
147
148  @SuppressWarnings("static-method")
149  @NonNull
150  private Ansi generatePreamble(@NonNull Level level) {
151    Ansi ansi = ansi().fgBright(Color.WHITE).a('[').reset();
152
153    switch (level) {
154    case CRITICAL:
155      ansi = ansi.fgRed().a("CRITICAL").reset();
156      break;
157    case ERROR:
158      ansi = ansi.fgBrightRed().a("ERROR").reset();
159      break;
160    case WARNING:
161      ansi = ansi.fgBrightYellow().a("WARNING").reset();
162      break;
163    case INFORMATIONAL:
164      ansi = ansi.fgBrightBlue().a("INFO").reset();
165      break;
166    default:
167      ansi = ansi().fgBright(Color.MAGENTA).a(level.name()).reset();
168      break;
169    }
170    ansi = ansi.fgBright(Color.WHITE).a("] ").reset();
171
172    assert ansi != null;
173    return ansi;
174  }
175}
